cards.title: Fracture
powers: Reduce the next damage dealt to {FractureCharacter} by 1. {FractureCharacter} deals 1 target 1 melee damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a hero. Increase the next damage dealt by that hero by 2.
One player may draw a card now.

cards.title: Body and Mind
body: {FractureCharacter} deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
If there are 3 or more Breach cards in play, increase that damage by 3.
If there are 4 or more Breach cards in your trash, increase that damage by 4.

flavorQuotes.text: But that's your problem. You{BR}never wanted to make anything.

cards.title: Close the Borders
body: You may destroy an Ongoing or environment card.
Destroy all Breach cards. For each card destroyed this way, you may either destroy an Ongoing or environment card or draw a card.

cards.title: Here and Gone
body: When this card enters play, move it next to a target. {FractureCharacter} deals that target 2 melee damage.
When the target next to this card deals damage, you may redirect that damage to a target of your choice. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Nice to see you again.{BR}Shame you can't stay.

cards.title: High and Low
powers: 1 target deals itself 2 irreducible projectile damage. You may destroy this card. If you do, cards from that target's deck cannot be played until the start of your turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Well fought. I can see how{BR}you defeated my father.

cards.title: Hit and Miss
body: When a non-hero target would deal damage, you may destroy this card. If you do, reduce that damage to 1.

cards.title: In Whole and in Part
body: When this card enters play and at the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, destroy an environment card and choose a damage type.
powers: If a damage type has been chosen for this card, {FractureCharacter} deals up to 2 targets 1 damage each of that type. Choose a damage type.

flavorQuotes.text: Is that, ah... is that healthy?

cards.title: Lead by Necessity
body: The first time any hero target is dealt damage each turn, reduce damage dealt to {FractureCharacter} this turn by 1 and {FractureCharacter} may deal the source of that damage 1 psychic damage.

cards.title: Mountains and Molehills
body: Reduce damage dealt by non-hero targets by 2.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm gonna have to burn this outfit.

cards.title: Research Assignment
body: Reveal the top card of a deck, then replace it.
Draw 2 cards.
You may discard 2 cards. If you do, one player may draw a card and play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Those markings aren't from any{BR}modern language, but they're a pretty{BR}close match to ancient Atlantean...

cards.title: Sample Kit
body: Whenever {FractureCharacter} would deal damage, you may change the type of that damage to a type of your choice.
Whenever you play a Breach card, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I got you some crosses and a{BR}thermos of holy water. Turns out you{BR}just have to ask nicely.

cards.title: Spirit and Flesh
body: When this card enters play, move it next to a target. Increase the first damage dealt by that target to another target each turn by 2.
At the end of this play area's turn, {FractureCharacter} may deal herself 1 irreducible psychic damage. If she takes no damage this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Thick and Thin
body: When this card enters play, move it next to a target. Reduce the first damage dealt by that target to another target each turn by 2.
At the end of this play area's turn, {FractureCharacter} may deal herself 1 irreducible psychic damage. If she takes no damage this way, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: You play with forces{BR}you don't even comprehend.

cards.title: Thoughts and Actions
body: At the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, up to 3 players each draw a card.
powers: Another hero may use a power now.
cards.flavorText: Get into a cell and close the{BR}door behind you. We'll be there as soon{BR}as we can. [b]RESPOND TO THIS MESSAGE.[/b]

cards.title: Within and Without
body: Each player may name a keyword other than One-Shot. Each player who does reveals cards from the top of their deck until they reveal a card with the keyword they named, puts that card into play or into their hand, then shuffles the other revealed cards into their deck.

cards.title: Yours, Mine, and Ours
body: At the end of your turn, you may destroy this card. If you do, one other player may draw a card, play a card, and use a power in any order, then their hero deals themself 3 psychic damage.
powers: Draw a card. Another player draws a card.

flavorQuotes.text: You're all a lot better than I{BR}expected for newcomers.

promoCards.title: Fracture
powers: Up to 2 targets regain 1 HP each.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.

openingLines.default: You know the drill. I'll evacuate the civilians.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Give me a minute to clear the area, then we'll hit him hard together.
